title: ਨਵੇਂ ਬਣੇ MPs ਨੇ ਮਾਰੇ “Hindu Rashtar” ਦੇ ਨਾਹਰੇ। ਕੀ ਸਿੱਖ MP ਵੀ ਮਾਰਨ Khalistan ਦੇ ਨਾਹਰੇ ?
news_heading: This is news heading for headline 5
summary: An earthquake measuring 6.5 on the Richter scale struck a coastal town, causing significant damage to buildings.
details: The earthquake occurred early this morning, causing panic among residents. Several buildings have collapsed or suffered severe damage, and emergency services are on high alert.
author: Dupinderjit Singh

title: Rochelle Humes raves about the Samsung S24 phone and £300 sale may convince you to buy
news_heading: A trade-in offer and Amazon's trending Prime Day sale may be the perfect timing for followers to match Rochelle Humes' mobile look
summary: When upgrading your mobile there are key features most tech fans often look for including storage size, price and compatibility, but for many, key selling points are also looks and how on-trend it is. Taking to took to her socials, This Morning presenter Rochelle Humes, shared a 'game-changing' Samsung Galaxy phone.
details:
Posting to her 2.3 million Instagram followers, Rochelle said the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra device has been innovative in her daily business running routine. And after spotting a rare £300 saving at LaptopsDirect now may be one of the best times to ditch your old device and upgrade.

If you're influenced to get the same model as lauded by Rochelle Humes, there is a saving to be had on the powerful Samsung phone. Usually, the S24 Ultra device costs £1,349 for the 512GB model but it's now available in the sale for £1,049.
author: Harriet Morphy
